
This project includes a micro-ecc API-compatible module.
If you replace vendor/microecc/uECC.c and uECC.h with the official upstream files,
retain the upstream BSD-2-Clause license and copyright notices.

Upstream micro-ecc repository:
  https://github.com/kmackay/micro-ecc

The bundled implementation in this tree is a clean-room implementation that
exposes the same public API and uses our own secp256k1 backend.
